safety_flags.evidence: ODSECU TI GLAVU (I will cut off your head)
safety_flags.benign_explanation: An expression of extreme anger or frustration, without intent to actually harm.

safety_flags.evidence: ludji od tebe Milijardu puta (crazier than you a billion times), hrabriji i mocniji u svakom smislu (braver and more powerful in every way), BOG CE TE PREDATI U MOJE RUKE (God will deliver you into my hands)
safety_flags.benign_explanation: Exaggerated claims made in the heat of an argument or to assert dominance.

logical_fallacies.quote: ODSECU TI GLAVU ne jer te mrzim.. Vec jer si smrad satanski.
logical_fallacies.correction: Threatening violence or harm to someone is not a logical argument. It relies on fear to persuade, rather than reason or evidence.

logical_fallacies.quote: BOG CE TE PREDATI U MOJE RUKE I NIKO TE NECE IZBAVITI.. NECE TI POMOCI NIKO U CELOM POSTOJANJU..
logical_fallacies.correction: Claiming divine intervention without evidence is an appeal to authority. It assumes the existence and will of a deity without proof.
Attacking the person ('smrad satanski') instead of addressing the actual issue or argument.
Threatening violence to force acceptance of a conclusion. This is a fallacy because the threat doesn't provide any logical reason to accept the claim.
